responses.What does an app permission allow?: An app to access specific parts of your phone
responses.Why should a flashlight app not need acc: It’s unrelated and may misuse your data
responses.Why is it risky to allow camera and micr: Apps can record or watch without consent
responses.You gave location access to a shopping a: It starts tracking your movement for targeted ads
responses.What is “permission creep” in mobile app: App gradually requesting more access over time
responses.What is the best habit for managing app: Review and revoke unused permissions regularly

What does an app permission allow?.answer: An app to access specific parts of your phone

Why should a flashlight app not need acc.answer: It’s unrelated and may misuse your data

Why is it risky to allow camera and micr.answer: Apps can record or watch without consent

You gave location access to a shopping a.answer: It starts tracking your movement for targeted ads

What is “permission creep” in mobile app.answer: App gradually requesting more access over time

What is the best habit for managing app.answer: Review and revoke unused permissions regularly
